divs: Sighting DetailsIt was just hovering. Thought maybe it was Venus. Then it was gone. It reappeared in front of us and flew past us. There was a glowing blue green light. An 18 wheeler and 2 other cars came to a screeching hault. Then it was gone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Houston
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Hovering then flew past us. Was glowing. Cars stopped in middle of highway.
